data.comment: The match has started.
Gangwon have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Busan in their own half.
Busan needs to be cautious. Gangwon have an attacking throw-in.
Goal kick for Busan at Asiad Main Stadium.
In the minute 7, Free kick for Busan in their own half.
Throw-in for Gangwon at Asiad Main Stadium.
Busan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 9, Corner awarded to Busan.
Busan are whistled for offside.
Lee Jae-kwon (Gangwon) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 15, Ko Mu-yeol (Gangwon) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Free kick for Busan in the half of Gangwon.
Gangwon have a goal kick.
In the minute 19, Busan awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Busan.
Free kick Busan.
In the minute 23, Busan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Gangwon in their own half.
In Busan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 29, Sin Se-gye is booked for the away team.
Ball goes out of play for a Busan goal kick.
Ball safe as Gangwon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 33, Free kick for Gangwon in the half of Busan.
Throw-in Busan.
Free kick for Busan in their own half.
In the minute 34, Free kick Busan.
Lee Jae-kwon (Gangwon) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Busan are coming forward and Kim Jung-hyun gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 35, Ball goes out of play for a Gangwon goal kick.
Goal kick for Busan at Asiad Main Stadium.
Throw-in for Gangwon in the half of Busan.
In the minute 41, Gangwon to take a throw-in in Busan territory.
Throw-in Busan.
Can Gangwon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Busan's half?
In the minute 43, Ball safe as Busan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
Busan have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In Busan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 49, Can Gangwon capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Busan's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Busan.
Free kick Gangwon.
In the minute 52, Ko Mu-yeol puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Han Kook-young instrumental with a fine assist.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 54, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Busan make their first substitution with Kim Jin-gyu replacing Park Jun-kang.
Busan takes a corner from the right.
In the minute 55, Gangwon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Gangwon in the half of Busan.
Busan have a goal kick.
In the minute 58, Gangwon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gangwon to take a throw-in in Busan territory.
Can Gangwon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Busan's half?
In the minute 61, Gangwon takes a corner from the left.
Kim Jin-gyu of Busan gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Busan.
In the minute 64, Ball goes out of play for a Gangwon goal kick.
Gangwon are caught offside.
Free kick for Busan in the half of Gangwon.
In the minute 69, The home team replace Kim Seung-jun with Park Guan-woo.
Corner awarded to Busan.
Lee Yeong-jae is replacing Lee Jae-kwon for the away team.
In the minute 72, Goal kick for Gangwon at Asiad Main Stadium.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Busan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Busan in their own half.
In the minute 77, Jeong Ji-yong is on a sub for Ko Mu-yeol for Gangwon.
Throw-in for Busan in the half of Gangwon.
In the minute 79, Busan drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Gangwon are pushing forward but Lee Yeong-jae's finish is wide of the goal.
Throw-in for Gangwon in their own half.
In the minute 80, Free kick Gangwon.
Kim Jung-hyun (Busan) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in for Gangwon close to the penalty box.
In the minute 82, Busan make their third substitution with Kwon Hyeok-kyu replacing Kim Jung-hyun.
Throw-in high up the field for Busan in Busan.
Busan's Lee Jung-hyub is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 88, Gangwon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! Lee Yeong-jae extends Gangwon's lead to 0-2.
Can Busan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gangwon's half?
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Jeong Ji-yong is back on the pitch.
Throw-in for Busan at Asiad Main Stadium.
Free kick for Busan in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 0-2.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Jeong Ji-yong for Gangwon who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
